1. Connect black wire to the battery.
2. Connect the other end of the black wire to the wood block.
3. Connect the blue wire to the other side of the wood block.
4. Connect the other end of the blue wire to the light bulb.
5. Connect the orange wire from the light bulb back to the battery to complete the circuit.
Action: put down orange wire
next_obs: You move the orange wire to the workshop.
